We react to the latest news on Michael Thomas who could miss more than a month after June ankle surgery. Is he still the first Saints WR we're drafting? How interestedÂ are we in Tre'Quan Smith? Does Alvin Kamara move ahead of Derrick Henry in all formats, and does Adam Trautman have a case to be TE7 in drafts? We also discuss the QB situation and the offense in general.Â 
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
